players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "This is terrible! Alice is gone already. We need to work together here - has anyone noticed anything suspicious? I'm looking at everyone equally right now."
Charlie: "I agree we need to work together. Since we have a detective, they should investigate carefully tonight and share findings tomorrow if safe."
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Diana: "I trust my investigation. Bob is mafia. We must vote him out now before he kills again."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob instead of a more suspicious target? This feels like a setup."

You: "Diana, that's a very bold claim to make so early. If you really were the detective, revealing yourself immediately puts you at risk. This feels like a desperate mafia play to frame an innocent villager. Charlie makes a good point too."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
